content.body: smaug: https://github.com/WICG/declarative-partial-updates/blob/main/patching-explainer.md is updated now, and explains what append and replace-children do now.
content.formatted_body: smaug: https://github.com/WICG/declarative-partial-updates/blob/main/patching-explainer.md is updated now, and explains what append and replace-children do now.

content.body: annevk: https://github.com/WICG/declarative-partial-updates/blob/main/patching-explainer.md#interleaved-patching has an example using append and a bunch of alternatives. Having written it down, I quite like the simplicity of the "Automatic defaults" alternative in common cases, but it would be good to get your take on this.
content.formatted_body: annevk: https://github.com/WICG/declarative-partial-updates/blob/main/patching-explainer.md#interleaved-patching has an example using append and a bunch of alternatives. Having written it down, I quite like the simplicity of the "Automatic defaults" alternative in common cases, but it would be good to get your take on this.
